column1: "description": "The table shows the Direction of Exports of India by Regions and Countries (in Rs. Cr. and US$ Mn.) since 2010-11. It gives details of the percentage change in value of Exports over the years. It also shows the country-wise share in Total Exports."
"title": "Download XLS for Direction of Exports: Exports by Regions and Countries (US $ Mn.)(External Link that opens in a new window)"
